targets.expr: avg by (instance, device, mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance"})
avg by (instance, device, mountpoint) (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}))

avg by (mountpoint) (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"}))
avg by (mountpoint) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"})

avg by (mountpoint) (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance="$instance", device=~"/.*"}))
